WEEK 7 INFO

PLAY IT THERE! https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' 

 "PRETTY DOPE ASS GAME" PLAYSTATION MAGAZINE MAY 2003 (kinda sus being in 2003 ngl) ISSUE

ALSO PLAY ON NEWGROUNDS.COM! https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

WE GOT MERCH, REP SOME PICO AND BOYFRIEND SHIRTS!!!! https://sharkrobot.com/collections/newgrounds

Uh oh! Your tryin to kiss ur hot girlfriend, but her MEAN and EVIL dad is trying to KILL you! He's an ex-rockstar, the only way to get to his heart? The power of music...

WASD/ARROW KEYS IS CONTROLS

- and + are volume control

0 to Mute

It's basically like DDR, press arrow when arrow over other arrow. And uhhh don't die.

----- update/mod description

Mod and GFX update list:

  1. To make this project possible, FNF+ was used.
  2. GF (GirlFriend) is custom Photoshopped... That took a while...
  3. Week 7 was not added, nor planned on being added to this modded client.
  4. All the new levels in Freeplay Mode are Custom Made by Chawi.

Playing Instructions: still WASD/Arrows.
